titles.title: City, O city, of our God,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
City, O city, of our God,
Glorious things are spoken of thee.
City, O city, of our God,
Glorious things are spoken of thee.
Such glorious things are spoken of thee.
City, O city, of our God,
Glorious things are spoken of thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This one and that one were born in her,
All my springs of joy are in you...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Singers and dancers together say,
"All my springs of joy are in you"...
